alert.note: Alert for Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Collier County through 245 PM EDT... At 224 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Hendry Correctional, or 20 miles southeast of Ave Maria, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Big Cypress National Preserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
